search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Time To Pet (time-to-pet.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.

extracted_content.content:
Simple and Transparent Pricing
------------------------------

Helping over 4,000 pet care companies generate millions in revenue every month.

Select Software

**$20/month**

**$200/year**

One person companies

For those just starting their pet care business journey or looking for a basic tool to help them manage scheduling and invoicing.

**$45/month**

**$450/year**

One person companies

For a growing, one person-business looking for advanced functionality like videos, integrations, and email marketing.

**$35/month**

+$15/month per active staff

For a pet care business that has staff members and needs additional tools like time off, permissions, pay reports, and more.

$110/month for

5 staff

**Large Team**

**Teams over 25**

For a large pet care business with more than 25 active staff members. Contact our team for custom pricing and additional onboarding support.

Feature

Lite

Solo

Team

Invoicing

Time To Pet Payments ![Image 1](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Take credit cards, ACH, or Google/Apple Pay. Pet parents can pay through the mobile app or web browser.

required

Automatic Charging ![Image 2](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Automatic Charging streamlines payment processing for your pet care business. You can customize the days and times for payments to run and select which invoices to charge, such as those due today or past due by a specified number of days.

Frequency Discounts ![Image 3](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Frequency discounts at Time To Pet are automatic discounts that apply when a client schedules a certain minimum number of services within a specified time period.

Customizable Rates ![Image 4](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Set custom client rates for varying prices on the same service. Time To Pet consistently applies these rates when generating future invoices for the client.

Bulk Invoicing ![Image 5](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Use Bulk Invoicing to streamline your invoicing tasks. Whether you want to email invoices or run card payments on specific days, Bulk Invoicing makes the process quick and efficient.

Scheduling

Client Service Requests ![Image 6](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Customers can submit service orders via the Client App or Portal for single or multiple events. Admins receive notifications for new requests, and they can approve, reject, and confirm them for clients.

Templates ![Image 7](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Templates automate scheduling and invoicing for regular, recurring customers based on their billing frequency, whether weekly or monthly.

Custom Views ![Image 8](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Gain insight into your company's schedule with ten customizable calendar views, three unique color-coding options, and the flexibility to filter by client, staff, or service type. Tailor your view to suit your needs perfectly.

Schedule Blocks ![Image 9](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) You define schedule blocks for specific days and times. Clients can choose from these blocks when requesting a service, and you can customize which services are available for each block.

Bulk Scheduling ![Image 10](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Use our Trip Tool to schedule multiple events in a single day or spanning multiple days - all at once.

Client Management

Portal & App Access ![Image 11](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Your clients will be able to request services, pay invoices, and send messages through a web portal or the mobile app.

Conversation Feed ![Image 12](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Time To Pet simplifies impressing customers with immediate updates after visits. Reports can feature notes, pictures, and a report card. Messages are sent via email, text, or push notifications through the Client's Time To Pet App, allowing direct responses.

Client & Pet Fields ![Image 13](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Access to customer data is crucial for pet care businesses. Custom Fields allow capturing specific information like leash or litter box location. Clients can update profiles via the App or Client Portal, or staff can do it. Customer info is accessible via the Staff App.

Videos ![Image 14](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) What do clients love more than getting pictures of their pets? Videos! Send videos that are up to 20 seconds long.

Email Campaigns ![Image 15](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Time To Pet simplifies creating and sending bulk email campaigns to all clients at once. Whether it's announcing a new hire or sending a monthly newsletter with images, the process is straightforward.

Staff Management

Staff App ![Image 16](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Staff need convenient access to schedules and client/pet details while in the field. The Time To Pet Staff App provides this, allowing them to view, complete, and update events with ease, including sending updates and pictures directly to customers from their smartphones.

GPS ![Image 17](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) GPS data enhances service transparency, collected during staff check-in/check-out or for the entire event. Optionally, clients can also access this data.

Time Off ![Image 18](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Staff can request time off or have it scheduled for them, with notifications for any conflicts. Visits can be swiftly reassigned, and staff can set up recurring time off for school or other commitments.

Roles ![Image 19](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Time To Pet offers four staff roles: admin, office manager, regular staff, and trainee, each with specific permissions and responsibilities tailored to their role.

Integrations

Zapier ![Image 20](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Time To Pet integrates with Zapier, allowing you to automate tasks and workflows in tools you use to manage your pet care company outside of Time To Pet.

Quickbooks Online ![Image 21](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Time To Pet integrates with your Quickbooks Online account, allowing your invoices, services, payments, and clients to be automatically kept in sync as changes are made in your Time To Pet account.

Text Messaging ![Image 22](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Time To Pet's text messaging offers flexibility for client communication. Messages can be delivered via push notification, email, or text message, and clients can respond directly. Staff phone numbers remain private as messages are sent from the company texting phone number, and responses are automatically captured in the conversation feed.

Dropbox Backup ![Image 23](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Time To Pet supports an automated integration with Dropbox to back up your client, pet, and schedule data nightly to your Dropbox account. When enabled and connected, look for the "Apps/Time To Pet" folder in your Dropbox account.

Calendar ![Image 24](https://www.timetopet.com/dist/marketing/images/question-mark.svg) Time To Pet supports calendar integrations with many third-party calendars such as Apple iCal, Google Calendar, Outlook, Yahoo Calendar, and any provider that supports the iCalendar format.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

*   [What is an active staff member?](https://www.timetopet.com/pricing#)
    
    An active staff member is any staff member who has at least one scheduled service during the billing period. Office managers and administrators are always counted as active.
    
    This is automatically calculated at the end of each billing period, which means there is no need to manually activate/deactivate staff members. Your costs will also be significantly lower during the slow months!
    
*   [What is your support like?](https://www.timetopet.com/pricing#)
*   [Can I Switch Between Plans?](https://www.timetopet.com/pricing#)
*   [Do I have to sign a contract?](https://www.timetopet.com/pricing#)

**Trusted by over 4,000 of the World's Most Successful Pet Care Companies.**

Free 14 day trial. Simple, transparent pricing gives you the tools and technology to impress your customers.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing varies based on the number of active staff members and includes options for individual and team plans.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For those just starting their pet care business journey or looking for a basic tool to help them manage scheduling and invoicing.
For a growing, one person-business looking for advanced functionality like videos, integrations, and email marketing.
For a pet care business that has staff members and needs additional tools like time off, permissions, pay reports, and more.
For a large pet care business with more than 25 active staff members. Contact our team for custom pricing and additional onboarding support.
